Class SpellCheckEditor

java.lang.Object
editor.Editor
editor.SpellCheckEditor
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable, Cloneable
public class SpellCheckEditor extends Editor implements Cloneable, Serializable
SpellCheckEditor is an extension of the Editor class that provides spell-checking functionality. It maintains a dictionary of words and can replace misspelled words with the closest match from the dictionary.
See Also:

  • Constructor Details

    • SpellCheckEditor

      public SpellCheckEditor(String text)
      Constructs a SpellCheckEditor with the specified text and initializes an empty dictionary.
      Parameters:
      text - the initial text of the editor

    • SpellCheckEditor

      public SpellCheckEditor()
      Constructs a SpellCheckEditor with an empty text and initializes an empty dictionary.

  • Method Details

    • addWord

      public void addWord(String word)
      Adds a word to the dictionary.
      Parameters:
      word - the word to be added to the dictionary

    • replace

      public String replace(String word)
      Replaces a word with the closest match from the dictionary if it is not found in the dictionary. A word is considered a match if it differs by exactly one character.
      Parameters:
      word - the word to be checked and possibly replaced
      Returns:
      the original word if it is found in the dictionary, or the closest match if it differs by one character

    • getDictionary

      public String getDictionary()
      Returns the content of the dictionary as a string, with each word on a new line.
      Returns:
      a string representation of the dictionary

    • reset

      public void reset()
      Resets the editor's text and clears the dictionary.
      Overrides:
      reset in class Editor

    • updateState

      public void updateState(Editor loadedEditor)
      Updates the state of the SpellCheckEditor with the state of another Editor. If the loaded editor is an instance of SpellCheckEditor, it copies the dictionary.
      Overrides:
      updateState in class Editor
      Parameters:
      loadedEditor - the Editor from which to load the state

    • spellcheck

      public void spellcheck()
      Performs spell-checking on the text by replacing each word with its closest match from the dictionary. If a word is not found in the dictionary, it remains unchanged.

    • toString

      public String toString()
      Returns a string representation of the SpellCheckEditor, including its text.
      Overrides:
      toString in class Editor
      Returns:
      a string representation of the SpellCheckEditor

    • clone

      public SpellCheckEditor clone()
      Creates a clone of the SpellCheckEditor. The cloned editor has its own dictionary, but shares the text with the original.
      Overrides:
      clone in class Object
      Returns:
      a cloned instance of SpellCheckEditor
